column4: hi - i found out my wireless card is disabled.... its a Intel Pro Wireless 3945ABG
i've searched google but I dont understand what to do
Go to a terminal and type ifconfig. Do you see wlan0 as UP?
Is your wireless card switched on? As in do you see the Wi-fi light?
Do you  have windows on your system as well?
i ran lshw and it says wireless network DISABLED - but i've tried toggling the front mounted switch - doesnt help...... tiyowan yes i have xp as a dual boot
Does the wi-fi work from windows?
yes it did - but i recently formatted windows and havent reinstalled
Ok. Please wait for one moment.
I  have the same card. The light should switch on when the wireless card is operating. Do you see it when you run lspci?
Do you see a line beginning with "Network controller" when you run lspci?
I'd say that front-mounted switch is busted.
I'm using intel 3945 on 8.10. The light comes on, or at least blinks before tweaking.
